src/parallel/ll-dgr-src/mpi_update_g.f File Reference

Detailed Description

Copy outward values of the pressure distribution function gbar from the ghosts into inward values in the real nodes after the streaming step.

MPI exchange is done using non-blocking receive and blocking send pairs (completed by a wait statement) in alternate directions to avoid deadlock. The components of gbar that need to be exchanged are packed into buffer arrays before the exchange.
